attributes.action: Stop Geo-Engineering Experiments to Dim the Sun
attributes.additional_details: We did not vote for this or give consent.
attributes.background: We want the government to stop experimentation, as we have not given consent.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make all forms of 'geo-engineering' affecting the environment illegal
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701963
